pages.text: Spiritual is a special energy with the same origin as experience orb that exists in the natural environment. It is invisible and untouchable. It is a very important resource. Although Reiki is diffused all over the world, the concentration of spiritual varies from world to world and even from biome to biome.

pages.title: Spiritual Stone
pages.text: Some special minerals have the ability to absorb spiritual, which is called spiritual stone. Emerald is one of them, but it contains very limited spiritual. Spiritual stone is the common currency among cultivators, in addition, it can also be used to extend the spiritual power of spirit fire and so on.
